oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ANALYTCAL APPROACH ON WAVE OVERTOPPING ON LEVEES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shi-igai, Hiroyoshi
Kono, Tsugio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: analytical approach
overtopping
levee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An analytical approach to evaluate the amount of overtopping for given conditions is studied in this paper Here, the wave overtopping is considered as a similar phenomenon to the flow over a weir changing the depth with respect to time The theoretical approaches used by many scholars have been mostly based on the dimensional analysis In this paper, however, another kind of approach is tried, which is rather deterministic, in order to get a general view of wave overtopping mechanism.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 12 (1970): Proceedings of 12th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Washington, D.C., 1970.; 34
